title: B.J. Novak and the Food Photographer
teaser: This week, B.J. Novak released his first book, a collection of humorous stories called “One More Thing: Stories and Other Stories“. In addition to the story he told us for the broadcast, he shared this second, equally internet-appropriate story, “The Man Who Took Pictures of Everything He Ate.”
contentencoded: This week, B.J. Novak released his first book, a collection of humorous stories called “One More Thing: Stories and Other Stories“. In addition to the story he told us for the broadcast, he shared this second, equally internet-appropriate story, “The Man Who Took Pictures of Everything He Ate.”
